buildCommand: pnpm --filter=@turbo-super/api build && pnpm --filter=@turbo-super/core build && pnpm --filter=@turbo-super/features build && pnpm --filter=@turbo-super/payment build && pnpm --filter=@turbo-super/shared build && pnpm --filter=@turbo-super/ui build  && pnpm --filter=ai-chatbot run build
